reviews.review_msg: Did not receive much feedback in this class, especially on assignments. The final project was intense and deadlines were not clear enough at all for something worth 20% of our grade. If you're struggling, definitely see him in his office hours and he's pretty helpful. Lectures were brutal (extremely boring) but I did learn a lot from this course.

Amazing professor. Cares a lot about his students, is always available for feedback or questions. Would highly recommend. Material is a bit simple, but he keeps his lectures fresh and interesting. 

One of my favourite professors I've ever had.
